name: Escape From Cozy Island
description: Escape from Cozy Island is an adventure in the middle of nowhere. Try to survive in a tropical wilderness and make the island to your new home!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space
